ygData.subject: Thunder Strike Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fellow wizards, I am very happy as I have just escaped level 30 hell, where you have to do three times as many kills to get same xp. Now I hope I don t
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fellow wizards,

I am very happy as I have just escaped level 30 hell, where you have to do three times as many kills to get same xp. Now I hope I don't die and lose a whole bub of xp, as happens in level 31. Anyway, I almost didn't buy Thunder Strike spell because I heard it was resisted a lot, like the terrible Force Strike spell, but no, it is great. I have casted many times on red mobs and hit for full damage, only an occasional resist. And it is fun to see the mob knocked back a bit when it hits. I have used Inferno Strike on the same mobs, and have seen it partially resisted, but Thunder Strike always hits for full. And it goes up 3 dmg per level like the other spells. I keep it loaded at all times now.

I don't have any info on the new quests. Anyone know of a good website to find out about them? I have tried Graffe's site but did not see info about the new ones.

And I agee with Lim'Dul, the grp teleports are fun. Was just able to help out someone who was stuck in a house in Kaladim, could not leave even when crouching, got stuck in doorway. So I teleported him out. He was so grateful, and made me feel pretty cool. And it is nice to make some pp teleporting higher level guys who give me /tells asking for a ride. I don't charge lower level guys, or people who are on corpse retrieval, etc.

Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
